Exercise.Name: Smoke Bomb Squats
Exercise.Description: Squat down as if releasing a smoke bomb and then explode up into a jump squat. Repeat.

Exercise.Name: Escape Mask Lunges
Exercise.Description: Perform alternating lunges while mimicking the motion of putting on an escape mask.

Exercise.Name: Helicopter Planks
Exercise.Description: Get into a high plank position and lift one arm at a time like you're signaling a descending helicopter. Alternate arms.

Exercise.Name: White Flag Burpees
Exercise.Description: Perform a burpee but instead of jumping at the end, raise your hands as if holding a white flag. Repeat.

Exercise.Name: Secret Box Crunches
Exercise.Description: Lie on your back, bring your knees to your chest, and perform crunches as if opening a secret box.

Exercise.Name: Negotiation Rage Push-Ups
Exercise.Description: Do push-ups while maintaining tension and anger in your movements, reflecting Raquel losing her cool during the negotiation call.

Exercise.Name: Respect Showdown Burpees
Exercise.Description: Perform a burpee and at the jump, do a 180-degree turn to symbolize the confrontation between Palermo and Gand√≠a.

Exercise.Name: Intervention Lunges
Exercise.Description: Perform forward lunges with a twist, reaching out like you're intervening to stop a fight.

Exercise.Name: Love Declaration Plank
Exercise.Description: Hold a plank position and twist your body to reach one arm up and behind as if professing love, alternating sides.

Exercise.Name: Brave Confession Jumping Jacks
Exercise.Description: Perform jumping jacks with an extra boost of energy and enthusiasm to reflect Nairobi's bravery in confessing her love.
